TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit RepeaterItem extends System.Web.UI.Control implements class System.Web.UI.IDataItemContainer, class System.Web.UI.INamingContainer

public ref class RepeaterItem : System::Web::UI::Control, System::Web::UI::IDataItemContainer
type RepeaterItem = class inherit Control interface IDataItemContainer interface INamingContainer

Docs.summary: Represents an item in the control.

remarks.format:
## Remarks A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeaterItem> object represents an item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> control, such as the heading section, footer section, or a data item.
The data items of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> control are stored in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeaterItemCollection> object that can be accessed by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.Items%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> control.
You can use a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeaterItem> object to programmatically access the properties of an item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> control.
## Examples The following example demonstrates how to use a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeaterItem> object to display the contents of each data item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> control.
[!code-aspx-csharp[Classic RepeaterItem Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic RepeaterItem Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic RepeaterItem Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic RepeaterItem Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a data item associated with the object in the control.
Docs.value: A that represents a data item in the control.

remarks.format:
## Remarks Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeaterItem.DataItem%2A> property to specify or determine the properties of a data item associated with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeaterItem> object in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> control.
> [!NOTE] > This property only applies to data items in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> control. The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeaterItem.ItemType%2A> property must be set to `ListItemType.Item`, `ListItemType.AlternatingItem`, `ListItemType.SelectedItem`, or `ListItemType.EditItem`.

Docs.summary: Gets the index of the item in the control from the collection of the control.
Docs.value: The index of the item in the control from the collection of the control.

remarks.format:
## Remarks Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeaterItem.ItemIndex%2A> property to determine the index number of the item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> control from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.Items%2A> collection of the control.
> [!NOTE] > This property only applies to data items in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> control. The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeaterItem.ItemType%2A> property must be set to `ListItemType.Item`, `ListItemType.AlternatingItem`, `ListItemType.SelectedItem`, or `ListItemType.EditItem`.
## Examples The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeaterItem.ItemIndex%2A> property to display the index number of the item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> control from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.Items%2A> collection of the control.
[!code-aspx-csharp[Classic RepeaterItem.ItemIndex Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic RepeaterItem.ItemIndex Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic RepeaterItem.ItemIndex Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic RepeaterItem.ItemIndex Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overridable ReadOnly Property ItemType As ListItemType

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

Docs.summary: Gets the type of the item in the control.

remarks.format:
## Remarks Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeaterItem.ItemType%2A> property to determine the type of an item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> control. The following table lists the different item types.
|Item Type|Description| |---------------|-----------------| |Header|The heading section of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> control.| |Footer|The footer section of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> control.| |Item|An item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> control.| |AlternatingItem|An alternating item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> control.| |SelectedItem|The selected item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> control.| |EditItem|The item selected for editing in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> control.| |Separator|A separator between the items of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> control.| |Pager|The page selection section of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> control.|
## Examples The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeaterItem.ItemType%2A> property to determine the item type of an item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> control. The order that items are created in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> control are displayed along with the item type.
[!code-aspx-csharp[Classic RepeaterItem.ItemType Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic RepeaterItem.ItemType Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic RepeaterItem.ItemType Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic RepeaterItem.ItemType Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]
